"Atrocious Ocean":
"We have detected Chrome Dragon readings
in the Coast area of planet Wopal.
In addition to Oceanids and Darkers, we are
detecting Natives and Mechs in the area.
We theorize that they were brought along
by Chrome Dragon as it traveled.
All ARKS are to investigate the situation.
―――――――――――――――――――
Clear by collecting [1500] Quest Points.
Earn Points by defeating enemies."
